attributes.action: Please put Yoga on the national cirriculum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yoga has been proved to be beneficial to health, reducing stress, and quickly repairing tissue damage. Its deep slow breathing does help Asthma suffers, and calm the mind, creating a peaceful, and repectful outlook on life. Many teachers have introduced a silent sitting time, to try and get the children into the right frame of mind, before class, but they lack the required skills, and complete knowledge of the correct method. Many children are crying out for something completely different, from the usual, Football, Rugby, and cricket, Yoga may be the answer, and many teachers would I am sure welcome this, as yoga includes within it, a programe of 'Human Values,' which are not only lacking, but not taught. An example-
'Advoid bad places, and all bad company.' Help ever, hurt never.' Please put Yoga into schools.
